cast.name: 艾拉娜·德·罗玛 Alana De Roma

director.name: 阿马甘·巴兰坦 Armagan Ballantyne

introduction: The EchoMan has never questioned his existence. Until one day he witnesses an event that brings into question everything he stands for and believes in. Combined live action with digital effects created on an SGI workstation using Discreet Logic's "Flame". Winner of the Gold Award in the Short Drama section at the ACS Awards, Australia 1999, the Best Use of Digital Technology Award at the St Kilda Film Festival, Australia 2000, Short Film of the Year at the Nescafe Short Film Awards, Australia 2000 and Best Cinematography Award at the NYU International Student Film Festival, USA in 2001.
